DOC.brief_summary: This study ass efficacy safety BGG492 use treat migraine pain .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis moderate severe migraine least 1 year At least 1 migraine episode , 15 migraine day per month Past use triptans Migraine onset 50 year age Diagnosis basilar , ophthalmoplegic hemiplegic migraine . More 6 nonmigraine headache per month Patients receive migraine prophylaxis treatment Patients receive regular treatment psychoactive drug Smokers Patients high low body weight Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
